full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## EE519-230664-B: Request for Proposal for Mooring Bollards Acquisition

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) seeking the acquisition of mooring bollards specific to the port of Cap-aux-Meules as part of the maintenance program for port facilities.

### Request Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS3641725397-Doc 3705920812
*   **RRFB Reference ID:** WS3641725397
*   **Publication Date:** October 14, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 2, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

### Key Specifications

*   **Type of Acquisition:** Procurement of mooring bollards specific to the port of Cap-aux-Meules
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Selection Criteria

*   The proposal will be selected based on a Lowest Price method.

### Important Information

*   Proposals must be submitted electronically and must include all required supporting documentation.
*   Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

### Contact Information

*   Name: Simon Presse (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14368583?extsite=MTQzNjg1ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14368583?aextsite=MTQzNjg1ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) ### Eligibility and Compliance

*   The RFP is open to all bidders.
*   Candidates must meet the requirements outlined in the RFP document. Only ensure that your output does not exceed the given 400-word count.
